programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Mohawk Murder: Jasmine Lynn
programme.desc: Shots are fired on an Atlanta college�s campus. A promising young woman has been killed seemingly without motive. Detectives Quinn and Vince will rely on multiple witness reports and a distinctive hairstyle to give closure to their victim�s family.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Field of Deception
programme.desc: When a young mother is found shot dead, investigators uncover a twisted web of jealousy and love triangle that could be to blame.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.sub-title: Sins of the City - East Cleveland
programme.desc: In 2013, East Cleveland’s reputation as a violent community would provide cover for a deranged serial killer. And when the sobering truth is revealed, the city faces the harsh reality that three women were killed all while no one seemed to notice.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.sub-title: Sins of the City - Memphis
programme.desc: In 2023, tensions in Memphis explode when 29-year-old Tyre Nichols dies, allegedly at the hands of a rogue unit within the Memphis PD. Activists take to the streets, igniting a furious backlash to a problem that has plagued the city for centuries.

programme.title: Find Our Missing
programme.sub-title: Find Our Missing - Brandon Graves/ Cleashindra Hall
programme.desc: A 24-year-old man disappears on a cold night after celebrating homecoming with old friends in Sumter, SC. New evidence in the case of 18-year-old Cleashindra Hall, who went missing in 1994 from Pine Bluff, AR, leads investigators to take action.

programme.title: Payback
programme.sub-title: Payback - The Princess Of Macon Drive
programme.desc: A former professional basketball player out for revenge decides to take justice into his own hands, but his murderous intent finds the wrong target, shattering the lives of a loving family.

programme.title: Payback
programme.sub-title: Payback - Burning Betrayal
programme.desc: After a roadside fire proves to be an attempt at covering up a brutal assassination, a police investigation exposes an intricate loan fraud scheme involving betrayal among friends and a pair of killers intent on revenge.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Hiding in Plain Sight
programme.desc: When LaJoya McCoy’s close-knit family requests a welfare check after they haven’t heard from her in days, all signs point to foul play. Investigators race to find the missing mother of two – dead or alive. But the grisly truth is as hard to fathom as the monster hiding in plain sight.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Killer on the Run
programme.desc: When a young single mother goes missing, police focus on the men in her life: her child’s father, a disappointed ex, and her current boyfriend. But the investigation takes a new direction when her boyfriend is also nowhere to be found. Is he another victim – or a killer on the run?

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Dangerously Desperate
programme.desc: Police are stunned when two young men are brutally gunned down in their own backyard. A search for the killer sends investigators into the tempestuous world of a desperate and heartbroken lover, and a complex web of lies that conceals the heinous truth.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Blind Devotion
programme.desc: When detectives in Lubbock, Texas respond to an early-morning robbery turned homicide, they�re not sure at first where to start looking for the killer. Soon, surveillance video and an anonymous tip will lead them to a dangerous young man, and the girlfriend who was willing to go to any lengths to hide her man�s secret.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Internet Dating Mystery
programme.desc: When mother of 4 Keyanta Williams decided to test the world of internet dating, she was surprised to find love so quickly after breaking-up with her long-time boyfriend. But when she goes missing after a night with her new beau, authorities aren’t sure if all is as it seems. Finding Keyanta will depend upon help from the most unlikely of people.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - False Redemption
programme.desc: When newlywed Trina Winston goes missing, her family initially fears she’s fallen back into the old drug habits she’s worked so hard to move past. But as police start looking for her, they learn there are even more sinister secrets lurking in the background – including the dangerous past her new husband is trying to hide.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Mask of a Killer
programme.desc: When the family of Shalisa O’Dell find her beaten to death at home, police immediately look at her boyfriend and ex as suspects. But as they uncover more about Shalisa, including her moonlighting job at a gentleman’s club, the suspect list grows. Did someone develop a deadly obsession with Shalisa, or does this murder hit closer to home?

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Risking It All
programme.desc: When a series of brazen, armed robberies strike local businesses in a tranquil community in Wisconsin, detectives find themselves with few clues to help them identify the perpetrators. That is, until police track down real-life Bonnie and Clyde willing to risk it all in the name of love.

programme.title: For My Man
programme.sub-title: For My Man - Road to Trouble
programme.desc: A gifted high school cheerleader�s bright plans for the future turn dark when she falls in love with an up-and-coming rapper and ex-con. Before long, she finds herself going down a road to trouble by hiding her relationship and risking her future in order to appease her man.

programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Finding Mr. Right: Renee Hutchinson
programme.desc: A new homicide detective learns the ropes investigating the brutal murder of an Atlanta woman when he receives a false confession from one of the woman�s friends. Quinn and Vince must steer this rookie detective in a new direction in order to get the right person behind bars.

programme.title: ATL Homicide
programme.sub-title: ATL Homicide - Inconvenient Truth: Craig Porter
programme.desc: Vince and Quinn are assigned to a year-old cold case murder of a man found shot to death in his car. After reviewing the case file again, a piece of original crime scene evidence surfaces, giving detectives a crucial clue to solve this murder.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - Casualty of Love
programme.desc: When an Army sergeant home on leave is gun downed on New Year’s Eve, police suspect the straight-arrow soldier may have been killed over beef with someone from his past. But an unexpected tip puts investigators on the trail of an off-limits romance.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.sub-title: Sins of the City - Tampa
programme.desc: When a local lottery winner in Lakeland, FL spends his winnings and disappears after enlisting the aid of a financial advisor, his sensational rags-to-riches story ultimately ends in tragedy.

programme.title: Sins of the City
programme.sub-title: Sins of the City - Baltimore
programme.desc: Baltimore is a vibrant city, but it’s also a town plagued by a history of violent crime. When the younger brother of the Baltimore Police Department’s spokesperson is gunned down in his apartment, the investigation reveals a suspect close to home.

programme.title: Find Our Missing
programme.sub-title: Find Our Missing - Shawndell McLeod / Erica Heather Smith
programme.desc: In Georgia, a 35-year-old head cook who�s looking for a new start after coming out of a bad relationship goes missing. - A beloved 14-year old daughter from Virginia goes out to a friend�s place and never returns.

programme.title: Payback
programme.sub-title: Payback - Revenge Times Two
programme.desc: The gruesome murder of a young mother who was stabbed at least 80 times tells investigators that this slaying is personal; after eliminating the men in the victim's life, police discover a plot for revenge that can only be described as true evil.

programme.title: Payback
programme.sub-title: Payback - New Year's Eve Nightmare
programme.desc: When two teenagers are found shot on New Years Eve, police are led to believe a mysterious shooter with a blue bandana is responsible, but a reluctant witness ultimately steers the investigation to a case of romantic revenge.

programme.title: Fatal Attraction
programme.sub-title: Fatal Attraction - False Redemption
